'''Task name:''' Using IRC

'''Description:''' Get on-line with ''Empathy'', ''Pidgin'', ''Xchat'' or ''Konversation''

'''Procedure:'''
* Open ''empathy'' in an ubuntu channel
* Test for readability and navigation in normal use
* Test the options window
* Optionally: test with ''xchat'' or ''konversation''

'''Comments:'''
* Please include the release you are testing with in your comment. Include your launchpad ID at the end of your comments:
** Click on https://launchpad.net/people/+me
** Look at the URL bar, everything behind the ~ sign is your Launchpad ID.
